Package io.github.nikmang.shserver.game

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nikmang.shserver.game.GameBoard
  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameBoard​(PlayerConfiguration config)
      Creates default game size: 6 fascist spaces, 5 liberal spaces and no cards played.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the current count for deadlocks in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard​(PlayerConfiguration config)
        Creates default game size: 6 fascist spaces, 5 liberal spaces and no cards played.
        Parameters:
        config - Player configuration, should be based on player count.

    • Method Detail

      • playPiece

        public GameBoardEffect playPiece​(Card card)
        Places a card on to the field and returns said effect from the configuration it was played at. Increments internal counter for said piece. Sets deadlock to 0.
        Parameters:
        card - Card type to be played.
        Returns:
        game board effect that is specified in PlayerConfiguration.

      • getWinner

        public Party getWinner()
        Get the winner for the game. Based on if current card played count is equal to the target count. For statistical purposes Party.HITLER is also a winner if Party.FASCIST wins. Otherwise Party.NONE is returned.
        Returns:
        Party of the winner of the game

      • getDeadlockCount

        public int getDeadlockCount()
        Returns the current count for deadlocks in the game.
        Returns:
        current deadlock count.

      • incrementDeadlock

        public void incrementDeadlock()
        Increments deadlock count.
